message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is below my minimum.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I would like to stick to my previous proposal of $12,000. I hope we can find a way to meet within this range.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $12,000.  Would you be willing to do $12,500?  This is my final offer.
